main event: A bright, motionless light was observed moving from north to south over Guam on June 24, 1957.
interesting points: The observation lasted for about 10 seconds., The light was an intense white color., The object was seen through a 20 degree telescope., The object moved in a straight line across an 80-100 degree field of view., The light disappeared due to clouds.
witness description: observation through a telescope from a signal watch tower.
